EBIT ≈ 4.3%; ROIC ≈ 10.1%; ACMR: 2025 revenue ~$900m and gross margin ~4%); use these as anchors rather than placeholders, and reconcile any conflicting claims; (5) tightening citations and removing uncited or weakly cited details (the crime vignette and the truncated Intel governance line)—either cite the correct source or omit; ensure every substantive assertion maps to GX057ADL7, J99EM2TPZ, RHXDOHQQX, or 22PL3Q360 and note any conflicts; (6) present a concise watch-list of decisive signals with thresholds: Sep rate path and actual cut magnitude, IEA 2025 supply/demand deltas, tariff-extension outcomes, Ford’s EV-cycle monetization metrics (Q3/Q4), AI‑capex spending data, 10Y yield moves, and FX/dollar trajectory; (7) improve format alignment with SECTION FOCUS by delivering a compact, multi-topic synthesis that makes the direction/sign, mechanism, and fragility explicit, and by keeping the tone consistent with a horizon/style that emphasizes cross‑topic drivers and actionable signals rather than a narrative gloss.
